meanings.definition: A type of necktie that is tied in the shape of a bow.
meanings.sent1: He wore a fancy bowtie to the party.
meanings.sent2: The bowtie matched his suit perfectly.
meanings.sent3: The bowtie looked like a little present around his neck.
meanings.sent4: His bowtie was a stylish accessory that stood out in the crowd.
meanings.sent5: The colorful bowtie added a touch of elegance to his outfit.

meanings.definition: A type of pasta shaped like a bow.
meanings.sent1: She cooked a delicious bowtie pasta for dinner.
meanings.sent2: The bowtie pasta was served with a creamy sauce.
meanings.sent3: The kids giggled at the bowtie pasta on their plates.
meanings.sent4: The bowtie pasta twisted and turned like little ribbons.
meanings.sent5: The bowtie pasta added a fun twist to the meal.
